string-array.name: morningStrings
string-array.item: Do your best today!
*yawn* Good morning!
Last night I dreamt I was surrounded by polar bears...
Caring for yourself is a priority and a necessity-- not a luxury.
Do something today that makes you feel proud.
Remember to eat breakfast!

string-array.name: afternoonStrings
string-array.item: How are you doing today?
Trust your instincts.
You have so much potential! Don\'t give up on yourself.
Be kind to yourself today!
Respect yourself.
You are brilliant!
Are you having a good day?
Make sure to take a break if you need it!

string-array.name: eveningStrings
string-array.item: It\'s getting late, isn\'t it?
Did you have a good day today?
I\'m getting a bit sleepy... how about you?
How are you feeling? Are you tired?
Make sure to brush your teeth before you go to bed!

string-array.name: rewardStrings
string-array.item: Great job, I knew you could do it!
You did your best, you should be proud!
The last time I tried to do that, it took me three days...
That must\'ve been hard, keep it up!

resources.string: A snack! How did you know I was hungry?
These are my favorite flowers! Thank you so much.
I needed a new umbrella, this one is perfect!
What a lovely drill! I\'ve been meaning to fix up the house, this\'ll get the job done nicely.
Fireworks! We should set them off tonight for fun.
Oh my! A photo? It\'s beautiful!
